channel.title: CVE Feed for nextcloud -- nextcloud-dialogs
channel.description: The latest CVEs for nextcloud -- nextcloud-dialogs

item.title: CVE-2021-29438|2024-08-03T22:02:51.929Z -- nextcloud -- nextcloud-dialogs
item.description: The Nextcloud dialogs library (npm package @nextcloud/dialogs) before 3.1.2 insufficiently escaped text input passed to a toast. If your application displays toasts with user-supplied input, this could lead to a XSS vulnerability. The vulnerability has been patched in version 3.1.2 If you need to display HTML in the toast, explicitly pass the `options.isHTML` config flag.
